keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Pentagon said that it had inadvertently shipped live anthrax spores to as many as nine laboratories and was investigating how that happened.

headline.print_headline: Live Anthrax Spores Shipped to Laboratories
headline.main: Live Anthrax Spores Shipped to Laboratories

snippet: The Pentagon said that it had inadvertently shipped live anthrax spores to as many as nine laboratories and was investigating how that happened.
abstract: Pentagon reports accidental shipment of live Anthrax spores to as many as nine laboratories, which were supposed to receive inactive spores; officials say public is not at risk, and mishap is under investigation.
